text: neohuineun geubungwa uinonhagi jeon e jaseon-eul bepul su eobs-eulila dulyeo wo haneunyo neohuiga geuleohge hal su eobsda hadeolado hananim-eun neohuileul yongseohasinani yebaeleul deuligo iseul lamseleul bachimyeo hananimgwa geubun-ui seonjija-ege sunjonghala hananim-eun neo huiga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul jikyeobogo gyesinila
